name: Filter
List day grouped by cameras
query: SELECT count("age") FROM "quarter"."log" WHERE time >= now() - 7d GROUP BY time(1h), "name" fill(null)

name: Influx to graph data
Retention 3 months
Retention policy quarter
query: CREATE RETENTION POLICY "quarter" ON "log" DURATION 12w REPLICATION 1;

name: Insert
func:
msg.payload = [
    {
        "time": msg.payload.timestamp,
        "x": msg.payload.path[0].x,
        "y": msg.payload.path[0].y,
        "dx": msg.payload.dx,
        "dy": msg.payload.dy,
        "age": msg.payload.age,
        "distance": msg.payload.distance,
        "pause": msg.payload.pause || 1
    },
    {
        "name": msg.payload.name || msg.payload.device,
        "device": msg.payload.device,
        "horizontal": msg.payload.dx < 0?"Left":"Right",
        "vertical": msg.payload.dy < 0 ? "Up":"Down",
        "type": "Object",
        "class": "Unknown"
    }
]
return msg;

name: List last hour
query: SELECT * from quarter.log WHERE time > now() - 1h
